name: Matching Cards Game For Kids Free
name_original: Matching Cards Game For Kids Free
description:
This is a good choice as the first memory card game for your kids. They have to find the pairs of two matching cards.

We included cool music and sound effects that make your children laughing. The graphics are simple, beautiful and colourful. There are three different themes, animals, toys and toons.

Features:
-Cute Graphics
-Hours of funny gameplay
-Suitable for all child's
-Cool sounds and music
-Universal version for iPhone, iPod touch and iPad

This is the free version with a few ads - You can find the ad free version in the store.
